clinical_diagnosis.customDisplay:
{{velocity}} #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') {{html wiki=false clean=false}}
#foreach ($val in $value) #set($entryName = "$!{services.vocabularies.ordo.getTerm($val).name}") #end
{{/html}} #elseif ($value && $value.size() > 0 && "${value.get(0)}" != '') #foreach ($val in $value) #set ($term = $!services.vocabularies.ordo.getTerm($val)) #set ($name = $term.name) #if ("$!{name}" == '') #set ($name = $val) #end #if ($term.id.indexOf(':') >= 0) #set ($termId = $stringtool.substringAfter($term.id, ':')) #else #set ($termId = $term.id) #end (% class="vocabulary-term-list" %)((([[$term.id>>http://www.orpha.net/consor/cgi-bin/OC_Exp.php?lng=EN&Expert=${termId}||class="term-id"]] $!{services.rendering.escape($name, $doc.syntax)}))) #end #end {{/velocity}}
clinical_diagnosis.name: clinical_diagnosis

exam_date.customDisplay: {{velocity}}{{html clean=false}} #set ($format = $services.recordConfiguration.getConfiguration("patient").dateOfBirthFormat) #set ($definedFormat = "$!object.xWikiClass.get($name).getProperty('dateFormat').value") #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') #set ($date = $services.jodatime.mutableDateTime) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $date.setZone($services.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end #if (!$value) #set ($value = $date) #else #set ($value = $services.jodatime.getMutableDateTime($value.time)) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $value.setZoneRetainFields($services.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end #end #if ($format.indexOf('d') < 0) #set ($selMonth = $value.monthOfYear) #set ($selYear= $value.year) #set ($mFormat = $format.replaceAll("[^M]", '')) #set ($yFormat = $format.replaceAll("[^y]", '')) #set ($startYear = $date.year - 99) #set ($endYear = $date.year + 1) #else #end #else #if ($value) #set ($value = $services.jodatime.getMutableDateTime($value.time)) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $value.setZoneRetainFields($services.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end $!xwiki.formatDate($value.toDate(), $format) #end #end {{/html}}{{/velocity}}
exam_date.name: exam_date

family_history.name: family_history
family_history.prettyName: List health conditions found in family (describe the relationship with proband)

family_of.customDisplay: {{velocity}} #if ($type == 'edit') {{html clean="false"}}<input class="suggested" id="${doc.fullName}_${prefix}${name}" name="${prefix}${name}" onfocus="new ajaxSuggest(this, {script: '$xwiki.getURL('', 'get', "xpage=suggest&classname=${field.className}&fieldname=${name}&firCol=eid.value&secCol=-")&', varname:'input'} )" type="text" value="$!escapetool.xml($value)" /> {{/html}} #elseif ("$!value" != '') #set ($matchingDocuments = $xwiki.wrapDocs($services.query.xwql("where doc.object(PhenoTips.PatientClass).external_id = :eid").bindValue('eid', $value).execute())) #if ($matchingDocuments.size() == 1) [[${value}>>$matchingDocuments.get(0).documentReference]]## #else $!value## #end #end {{/velocity}}
family_of.name: family_of
family_of.prettyName: This patient is part of the familiy of
family_of.sql: select eid.value from BaseObject as obj, StringProperty as eid where obj.className = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass' and eid.id.id = obj.id and eid.id.name = 'external_id'

gestation.name: gestation

negative_phenotype.name: negative_phenotype
negative_phenotype.prettyName: Symptoms NOT observed in this patient

negative_prenatal_phenotype.name: negative_prenatal_phenotype
negative_prenatal_phenotype.prettyName: Prenatal symptoms NOT observed in this patient

omim_id.customDisplay:
{{velocity}} #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') {{html wiki=false clean=false}}
#foreach ($val in $value) #set($entryName = "$!{services.vocabularies.omim.getTerm($val).name}") #end
{{/html}} #elseif ($value && $value.size() > 0 && "${value.get(0)}" != '') #foreach ($val in $value) #set ($term = $!services.vocabularies.omim.getTerm($val)) #set ($name = $term.name) #if ("$!{name}" == '') #set ($name = $val) #end #if ($term.id.indexOf(':') >= 0) #set ($termId = $stringtool.substringAfter($term.id, ':')) #else #set ($termId = $term.id) #end (% class="vocabulary-term-list" %)((([[~$!{stringtool.defaultString($!term.symbol, ' ')}${term.id}>>http://www.omim.org/entry/${termId}||class="term-id"]] $!{services.rendering.escape($name, $doc.syntax)}))) #end #end {{/velocity}}
omim_id.name: omim_id
